key.name: cover-size
key.description: Defines the size for the covers showed on the source.

key.name: add-shadow
key.description: Indicates if the albums should drop a shadow on the cover view

key.name: shadow-image
key.summary: Shadow image to be used behind album's covers
key.description: The shadow image used behind the album's cover allows to give the effect as if the light source were in a determined position

key.name: custom-statusbar
key.summary: If the plugin source's custom status bar should be used.
key.description: Determines if the plugin should use the source's custom statusbar to show the current selected album's related information instead of the global Rhythmbox's statusbar.

key.name: display-bottom
key.description: Add a toggle-option to the coverart view to display a tracks and covers pane where you can see these for the chosen album

key.name: display-text
key.description: Show the album's basic information under the cover image.

key.name: display-text-ellipsize
key.description: Ellipsizes the albums names to a fixed length when the display text option is enabled.

key.name: display-text-ellipsize-length
key.description: This is the maximum allowed size for an album's name before being ellipsized.

key.name: display-font-size
key.description: This is font size for the album text below the cover-art.

key.name: paned-position
key.description: Position of the horizontal paned-handle divider.

key.name: sort-by
key.description: Sort by criteria.

key.name: sort-order
key.description: Using the chosen sort type, sort the coverview in either ascending or descending order.

key.name: rating-threshold
key.description: Level above which is regarded as a favourite rated track.

key.name: autostart
key.description: When rhythmbox starts, switch automatically to the coverart browser.

key.name: toolbar-pos
key.description: Indicates where the toolbar should be shown. "main" is for the cover view, "left" for the left sidebar and "right" for the right sidebar.

key.name: sort-by-rating
key.description: Determines if the coverview should be sorted by album rating.

key.name: sort-by-year
key.description: Determines if the coverview should be sorted by album-year.

key.name: year-sort-visible
key.description: Determines if the year sorting option should be visible.

key.name: rating-sort-visible
key.description: Determines if the rating sorting option should be visible.

key.name: genre-filter-visible
key.description: Determines if the genre filter should be visible.

key.name: button-relief
key.description: True for a flat button style.

key.name: theme
key.description: Name of the chosen theme.

key.name: new-genre-icon
key.description: Plugin toggles this to indicate a new genre - it has no real meaning other than to fire a signal when the state is changed.

key.name: icon-padding
key.description: icon view item-padding

key.name: icon-spacing
key.description: icon view (rows and columns)

key.name: view-name
key.description: View name to start with when the plugin is initialised.

key.name: flow-appearance
key.summary: Name of the type of coverflow.
key.description: Coverflow type.

key.name: flow-hide-caption
key.description: Whether to hide the caption on the coverflow.

key.name: flow-scale
key.description: Percentage size for the coverflow image from 100% to 200%.

key.name: flow-background-colour
key.description: W is white B is Black.

key.name: flow-automatic
key.summary: Open and close track-view on click.
key.description: When clicking the flow picture automatically show or hide the track-view

key.name: flow-width
key.description: Width of the chosen coverflow in px.

key.name: flow-max-albums
key.description: Total number of albums to display in the coverflow.
